meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Conference Room 6ES, Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public; introduction of new commission members; additions/changes to committee assignments, scheduling of committee meetings and consideration of future agenda item.

agenda_items.title: Staff Update on U.S Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) Five-Year Consolidated Plan
agenda_items.description: Update on the HUD Five-Year Consolidated Plan (FY 2024-25 through 2028-29) and FY 2024-25 Budget Development Process.

agenda_items.title: Training on Chapter 12A-Code of Ethics for CDC
agenda_items.description: Training session on the Code of Ethics for the Community Development Commission.
agenda_items.presenter: Baron Eliason, Chief Integrity Officer, Inspector General Division – Dallas City Attorney’s Office

agenda_items.title: Training on Texas Open Meetings Act (T.O.M.A) for CDC
agenda_items.description: Training session on the Texas Open Meetings Act for the Community Development Commission.
agenda_items.presenter: Brady Flanery, Assistant City Attorney, General Counsel Division – Dallas City Attorney’s Office

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report may include general greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public; introduction of new commission members; additions/changes to committee assignments, scheduling of committee meetings and consideration of future agenda item.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: This report includes general acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: Announcements
agenda_items.description: Announcements may include expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition of public officials, employees, or citizens.
